info.title: Amazon RDS Option Group API
info.description: The API for managing Amazon RDS Option Groups

parameters.name: SourceOptionGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier or ARN for the source option group. For information about        creating an ARN,       see         Constructing an RDS Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

parameters.name: Tags.member.N
parameters.description: A list of tags.

parameters.name: TargetOptionGroupDescription
parameters.description: The description for the copied option group.

parameters.name: TargetOptionGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the copied option group.

parameters.name: EngineName
parameters.description: Specifies the name of the engine that this option group should be associated with.

parameters.name: MajorEngineVersion
parameters.description: Specifies the major version of the engine that this option group should be associated with.

parameters.name: OptionGroupDescription
parameters.description: The description of the option group.

parameters.name: OptionGroupName
parameters.description: Specifies the name of the option group to be created.

parameters.name: Tags.member.N
parameters.description: A list of tags.

parameters.name: OptionGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the option group to be deleted.

parameters.name: EngineName
parameters.description: A required parameter. Options available for the given engine name will be described.

parameters.name: Filters.member.N
parameters.description: This parameter is not currently supported.

parameters.name: MajorEngineVersion
parameters.description: If specified, filters the results to include only options for the specified major engine version.

parameters.name: Marker
parameters.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous request.            If this parameter is specified, the response includes            only records beyond the marker,            up to the value specified by MaxRecords.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response.            If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value,            a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so that the remaining            results can be retrieved.

parameters.name: EngineName
parameters.description: Filters the list of option groups to only include groups associated with a specific database engine.

parameters.name: Filters.member.N
parameters.description: This parameter is not currently supported.

parameters.name: MajorEngineVersion
parameters.description: Filters the list of option groups to only include groups associated with a specific database engine version. If specified, then EngineName must also be specified.

parameters.name: Marker
parameters.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous DescribeOptionGroups request.            If this parameter is specified, the response includes            only records beyond the marker,            up to the value specified by MaxRecords.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response.            If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value,            a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so that the remaining            results can be retrieved.

parameters.name: OptionGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the option group to describe.  Cannot be supplied together with EngineName or MajorEngineVersion.

parameters.name: ApplyImmediately
parameters.description: Indicates whether the changes should be applied immediately,            or during the next maintenance window for each instance associated with the option group.

parameters.name: OptionGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the option group to be modified.

parameters.name: OptionsToInclude.member.N
parameters.description: Options in this list are added to the option group or, if already present,            the specified configuration is used to update the existing configuration.

parameters.name: OptionsToRemove.member.N
parameters.description: Options in this list are removed from the option group.
